thread.title: Photos: Mavs drop to 0-6 in preseason with loss to Suns
thread.title_full: Photos: Mavs drop to 0-6 in preseason with loss to Suns | Dallas Morning News

author: dallasnews
title: Photos: Mavs drop to 0-6 in preseason with loss to Suns
text: Phoenix Suns center Tyson Chandler (4) and Dallas Mavericks forward Dirk Nowitzki (41) share a hug and a laugh after a preseason game at American Airlines Center in Dallas, on Wednesday, October 21, 2015. The Phoenix Suns defeated the Dallas Mavericks 99-87. (Vernon Bryant/The Dallas Morning News)
